GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /API/articles/:article_id.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/article_id/comments.description: shows connected comments to the article.

GET /api/users.description: Shows all users of the site.

POST api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Can post comments if you input post command via insomnia or another tool.
POST api/articles/:article_id/comments.Query: please inert a valid body, user and article id to assign the body of the comment to.

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Allows you to patch the votes of an article for those updoots.
PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.query: Please insert a vote in number format, followed by valid article ID.

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Allows the moderators to remove comment by their IDS
DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.query: input valid comment ID to delete it in the endpoint.
